005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.commands;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.CLIProcessor;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.CLIProcessor.CallingContext;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.ExitCode;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.ExitStatus;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.InvalidArgumentException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.OptionUtils;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.AbstractCommandExecutor;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.AbstractTerminalCommand;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.DefaultExtraArgument;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ExtraArgument;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.util.LoggingValidationHandler;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.DefaultConfiguration;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IMutableConfiguration;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IConstraintLoader;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ValidationFeature;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.AggregateValidationResult;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.IValidationResult;
028import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
029import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CustomCollectors;
030import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.IVersionInfo;
031import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
032import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.UriUtils;
033import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
034import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext.ISchemaValidationProvider;
035import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.Format;
036import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.IBoundLoader;
037import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.BindingConstraintLoader;
038import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.modules.sarif.SarifValidationHandler;
039
040import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
041import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
042import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
043import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
044
045import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
046import java.io.IOException;
047import java.net.URI;
048import java.net.URISyntaxException;
049import java.net.UnknownHostException;
050import java.nio.file.Path;
051import java.nio.file.Paths;
052import java.util.Arrays;
053import java.util.Collection;
054import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
055import java.util.List;
056import java.util.Locale;
057import java.util.Set;
058
059import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
060
061public abstract class AbstractValidateContentCommand
062    extends AbstractTerminalCommand {
063  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(AbstractValidateContentCommand.class);
064  @NonNull
065  private static final String COMMAND = "validate";
066  @NonNull
067  private static final List<ExtraArgument> EXTRA_ARGUMENTS = ObjectUtils.notNull(List.of(
068      new DefaultExtraArgument("file-or-URI-to-validate", true)));
069
070  @NonNull
071  private static final Option AS_OPTION = ObjectUtils.notNull(
072      Option.builder()
073          .longOpt("as")
074          .hasArg()
075          .argName("FORMAT")
076          .desc("source format: xml, json, or yaml")
077          .numberOfArgs(1)
078          .build());
079  @NonNull
080  private static final Option CONSTRAINTS_OPTION = ObjectUtils.notNull(
081      Option.builder("c")
082          .hasArgs()
083          .argName("URI")
084          .desc("additional constraint definitions")
085          .build());
086  @NonNull
087  private static final Option SARIF_OUTPUT_FILE_OPTION = ObjectUtils.notNull(
088      Option.builder("o")
089          .hasArg()
090          .argName("FILE")
091          .desc("write SARIF results to the provided FILE")
092          .numberOfArgs(1)
093          .build());
094  @NonNull
095  private static final Option SARIF_INCLUDE_PASS_OPTION = ObjectUtils.notNull(
096      Option.builder()
097          .longOpt("sarif-include-pass")
098          .desc("include pass results in SARIF")
099          .build());
100
101  @Override
102  public String getName() {
103    return COMMAND;
104  }
105
106  @SuppressWarnings("null")
107  @Override
108  public Collection<? extends Option> gatherOptions() {
109    return List.of(
110        AS_OPTION,
111        CONSTRAINTS_OPTION,
112        SARIF_OUTPUT_FILE_OPTION,
113        SARIF_INCLUDE_PASS_OPTION);
114  }
115
116  @Override
117  public List<ExtraArgument> getExtraArguments() {
118    return EXTRA_ARGUMENTS;
119  }
120
121  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.PreserveStackTrace") // intended
122  @Override
123  public void validateOptions(CallingContext callingContext, CommandLine cmdLine) throws InvalidArgumentException {
124    List<String> extraArgs = cmdLine.getArgList();
125    if (extraArgs.size() != 1) {
126      throw new InvalidArgumentException("The source to validate must be provided.");
127    }
128
129    if (cmdLine.hasOption(AS_OPTION)) {
130      try {
131        String toFormatText = cmdLine.getOptionValue(AS_OPTION);
132        Format.valueOf(toFormatText.toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT));
133      } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
134        InvalidArgumentException newEx = new InvalidArgumentException(
135            String.format("Invalid '%s' argument. The format must be one of: %s.",
136                OptionUtils.toArgument(AS_OPTION),
137                Arrays.asList(Format.values()).stream()
138                    .map(format -> format.name())
139                    .collect(CustomCollectors.joiningWithOxfordComma("and"))));
140        newEx.addSuppressed(ex);
141        throw newEx;
142      }
143    }
144  }
145
146  protected abstract class AbstractValidationCommandExecutor
147      extends AbstractCommandExecutor
148      implements ISchemaValidationProvider {
149
150    public AbstractValidationCommandExecutor(
151        @NonNull CallingContext callingContext,
152        @NonNull CommandLine commandLine) {
153      super(callingContext, commandLine);
154    }
155
156    @NonNull
157    protected abstract IBindingContext getBindingContext(@NonNull Set<IConstraintSet> constraintSets)
158        throws MetaschemaException, IOException;
159
160    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn") // readability
161    @Override
162    public ExitStatus execute() {
163      URI cwd = ObjectUtils.notNull(Paths.get("").toAbsolutePath().toUri());
164      CommandLine cmdLine = getCommandLine();
165
166      Set<IConstraintSet> constraintSets;
167      if (cmdLine.hasOption(CONSTRAINTS_OPTION)) {
168        IConstraintLoader constraintLoader = new BindingConstraintLoader(IBindingContext.instance());
169        constraintSets = new LinkedHashSet<>();
170        String[] args = cmdLine.getOptionValues(CONSTRAINTS_OPTION);
171        for (String arg : args) {
172          assert arg != null;
173          try {
174            URI constraintUri = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(UriUtils.toUri(arg, cwd));
175            constraintSets.addAll(constraintLoader.load(constraintUri));
176          } catch (IOException | MetaschemaException | MetapathException | URISyntaxException ex) {
177            return ExitCode.IO_ERROR.exitMessage("Unable to load constraint set '" + arg + "'.").withThrowable(ex);
178          }
179        }
180      } else {
181        constraintSets = CollectionUtil.emptySet();
182      }
183
184      IBindingContext bindingContext;
185      try {
186        bindingContext = getBindingContext(constraintSets);
187      } catch (IOException | MetaschemaException ex) {
188        return ExitCode.PROCESSING_ERROR
189            .exitMessage("Unable to get binding context. " + ex.getMessage())
190            .withThrowable(ex);
191      }
192
193      IBoundLoader loader = bindingContext.newBoundLoader();
194
195      List<String> extraArgs = cmdLine.getArgList();
196
197      String sourceName = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(extraArgs.get(0));
198      URI source;
199
200      try {
201        source = UriUtils.toUri(sourceName, cwd);
202      } catch (URISyntaxException ex) {
203        return ExitCode.IO_ERROR.exitMessage("Cannot load source '%s' as it is not a valid file or URI.")
204            .withThrowable(ex);
205      }
206
207      Format asFormat;
208      if (cmdLine.hasOption(AS_OPTION)) {
209        try {
210          String toFormatText = cmdLine.getOptionValue(AS_OPTION);
211          asFormat = Format.valueOf(toFormatText.toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT));
212        } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
213          return ExitCode.IO_ERROR
214              .exitMessage("Invalid '--as' argument. The format must be one of: "
215                  + Arrays.stream(Format.values())
216                      .map(format -> format.name())
217                      .collect(CustomCollectors.joiningWithOxfordComma("or")))
218              .withThrowable(ex);
219        }
220      } else {
221        // attempt to determine the format
222        try {
223          asFormat = loader.detectFormat(source);
224        } catch (FileNotFoundException ex) {
225          // this case was already checked for
226          return ExitCode.IO_ERROR.exitMessage("The provided source file '" + source + "' does not exist.");
227        } catch (IOException ex) {
228          return ExitCode.PROCESSING_ERROR.exit().withThrowable(ex);
229        } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
230          return ExitCode.IO_ERROR.exitMessage(
231              "Source file has unrecognizable format. Use '--as' to specify the format. The format must be one of: "
232                  + Arrays.stream(Format.values())
233                      .map(format -> format.name())
234                      .collect(CustomCollectors.joiningWithOxfordComma("or")));
235        }
236      }
237
238      if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
239        LOGGER.info("Validating '{}' as {}.", source, asFormat.name());
240      }
241
242      IMutableConfiguration<ValidationFeature<?>> configuration = new DefaultConfiguration<>();
243      if (cmdLine.hasOption(SARIF_OUTPUT_FILE_OPTION) && cmdLine.hasOption(SARIF_INCLUDE_PASS_OPTION)) {
244        configuration.enableFeature(ValidationFeature.VALIDATE_GENERATE_PASS_FINDINGS);
245      }
246
247      IValidationResult validationResult;
248      try {
249        // perform schema validation
250        validationResult = this.validateWithSchema(source, asFormat);
251
252        if (validationResult.isPassing()) {
253          // perform constraint validation
254          IValidationResult constraintValidationResult = bindingContext.validateWithConstraints(source, configuration);
255          validationResult = AggregateValidationResult.aggregate(validationResult, constraintValidationResult);
256        }
257      } catch (FileNotFoundException ex) {
258        return ExitCode.IO_ERROR.exitMessage(String.format("Resource not found at '%s'", source)).withThrowable(ex);
259
260      } catch (UnknownHostException ex) {
261        return ExitCode.IO_ERROR.exitMessage(String.format("Unknown host for '%s'.", source)).withThrowable(ex);
262
263      } catch (IOException ex) {
264        return ExitCode.IO_ERROR.exit().withThrowable(ex);
265      } catch (MetapathException ex) {
266        return ExitCode.PROCESSING_ERROR.exit().withThrowable(ex);
267      }
268
269      if (cmdLine.hasOption(SARIF_OUTPUT_FILE_OPTION) && LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
270        Path sarifFile = Paths.get(cmdLine.getOptionValue(SARIF_OUTPUT_FILE_OPTION));
271
272        IVersionInfo version
273            = getCallingContext().getCLIProcessor().getVersionInfos().get(CLIProcessor.COMMAND_VERSION);
274
275        try {
276          SarifValidationHandler sarifHandler = new SarifValidationHandler(source, version);
277          sarifHandler.addFindings(validationResult.getFindings());
278          sarifHandler.write(sarifFile);
279        } catch (IOException ex) {
280          return ExitCode.IO_ERROR.exit().withThrowable(ex);
281        }
282      } else if (!validationResult.getFindings().isEmpty()) {
283        LOGGER.info("Validation identified the following issues:", source);
284        LoggingValidationHandler.instance().handleValidationResults(validationResult);
285      }
286
287      if (validationResult.isPassing()) {
288        if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
289          LOGGER.info("The file '{}' is valid.", source);
290        }
291      } else if (LOGGER.isErrorEnabled()) {
292        LOGGER.error("The file '{}' is invalid.", source);
293      }
294
295      return (validationResult.isPassing() ? ExitCode.OK : ExitCode.FAIL).exit();
296    }
297  }
298}
